extendedInfo.description: Free flashlight app for your device! Incredibly simple, very useful, and the best flashlight app for android yet. Will use your device's camera LED / flash / screen as a torch.Tiny Flashlight is currently the best free led flashlight app on the market.* Supports the widest range of devices with camera flashlight (led flash)* Brightest flashlight / torch using the camera flashlight, which emits very intense light in the dark. * Widgets with different layouts to choose from.* Lock screen widgets with direct light availability from your lock screen on devices with a camera flash.* Great and diverse screen lights.* Has the best free flashlight support.* Flashlight app with beautiful layout and simple controls.* Free flashlight without any additional / hidden costs.* The best flashlight and one of the highest rated on the market.* The best tablet app available today on all device resolutions.* Flashlight with a small memory footprint, low battery and CPU consumption. Highly optimized.* Strobe light function with adjustable on/off intervals* Morse code functionality with a Text to Morse code support.Light sources:============== * Camera LED flashlight - Uses your phone's camera flashlight to emit bright light. Note that some devices don't have a camera flashlight. In this case the led flashlight option will be disabled. * Screen Light - This is the basic white screen flashlight, which is bright enough for daily use. You can use it as your primary flashlight option in case your device doesn't have a camera flashlight or you want to save the battery. * Warning Lights, Police Lights, Color Flashlight, Strobe Flashlight, Morse Code, Text to Morse, Manual Morse Code, Camera Light - Different light sources, which may be useful in many situations. You can change the brightness and the colors.The Best Free Flashlight app when you need reliability, functionality, and lights diversityCAUTION: Strobe lighting can trigger seizures in photosensitive epilepsy!Best Flashlight Widget and Lock Screen widgets:========Tiny Flashlight is one of the few applications on the android market, which is free and has different widgets to choose from when the device has an option for a led flashlight. Also, Tiny Flashlight supports the newly added lockscreen widgets in Android 4.2 and later.Flashlight Permissions:============Why Tiny Flashlight needs so many permissions and how are they used:* TAKE PICTURES AND VIDEOS (CAMERA flashlight) - In order to start the camera flashlight on some devices, Tiny Flashlight has to use a small part of the camera hardware and it needs this permission. Don't worry, I'm not taking any pictures or videos without your permission. Tiny Flashlight is just accessing the camera LED / flash.*** As you know, Tiny Flashlight is free, but also is one of the best supported apps on the Android Market. Currently, this is the only app that supports almost all devices with camera flashlight and fully supports all versions of Android (1.5 to 4.0). This takes huge amounts of time and effort and in order for Tiny Flashlight to remain the best flashlight on the market, I have to use ads inside it.The following permissions are required by Google's own ad provider (Admob) and Millennial Media (the biggest independent ad network). Both are respected industry leaders.* INTERNET - Used to load ad info from their servers. Nothing more.* READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY - Some Motorola devices have factory bugs. These devices don't have unique IDs and this became a problem for ad networks, because they can't function without it. There is a workaround for this problem by using the PHONE IDENTITY permission. This permission is used only for getting a unique id.Key words:flashlightbest flashlight,free flashlight,torch, strobe, brightest, best tablet app, tablet torch, free, camera, night, LED, light, flash, linterna, ÑÐ¾Ð½Ð°ÑÐ¸Ðº, æçµç­, free torch, best torch, best app

reviews.title: Motorola DROID RAZR
reviews.comment: Keith 12-24-12 Great app! Had on my Nexus and now on my RAZR!  Works perfect with no problems! Comes in handy!! Very well done!! Thanks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most useful app best flashlight.
reviews.comment: One of the best apps on android without a doubt. So useful!
reviews.author: Ash z

reviews.title: Most excellent, must have app
reviews.comment: Does what it says, works great, cool features in addition to turning on \"flashlight\" Going to add it to my wife\'s new phone once she switches over!  Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Larry Andershock

reviews.title: useful and wonderful
reviews.comment: this is must have tool app for every droid,  so simple and easy,  with a lot of features include.  thank you nick!
reviews.author: Bintang Xabilar Rosyad Dhanny

reviews.title: Well designed and works perfectly.
reviews.comment: Excellent light distribution.  Has several flash/colour modes which are useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have application for ANY android user
reviews.comment: A nice little app that brings a function 95% of android phone users will find useful. Some gimmicky extra light functions that accompany this application but not being distracted from what this app is intended. Overall above average app that does what it says on the tin. Lightningpete - LgOptimus2X / 4X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The most useful app only mobile.
reviews.comment: Comes handy whenever you need a torch. Plus has a variety of lighting patterns.
reviews.author: Sudip Sinha

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app and very useful. Better than the other flashlight apps because it has more features
reviews.author: Alejandra Perez Escalona

reviews.title: Nice app found very useful
reviews.comment: One of the best and useful apps on Google play store
reviews.author: kiran jagtap

reviews.title: Love It
reviews.comment: Great I Recommend This App Very Cool
reviews.author: Bill Yarbro

reviews.title: Nice and versatile
reviews.comment: This is useful. I particularly like the opening screen. It knows landscape on a tablet. Not all flashlight programs, even the good ones do. Also, showing the battery gauge is a useful feature in this program. But where is the main flashlight brightness control?
reviews.author: Timo Salmi

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Best flashlight app on the android market. Says what it does, cool features, best of all is the widget option. Only app i know that has it. Instant light when you need it. There are some problems, light only stays on for a minute or so than shuts off and keeps shutting off. Other than that, its perfect,
reviews.author: Rastah Jellie

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: This is an awesome and easy app. But it would be cool if you had a backlight.
reviews.author: Kaylee F

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Super easy to use and has a bunch of cool features. Work grave yard needed more light in my car to check my make up now I have more light!
reviews.author: Bonnie Smith

reviews.title: Lovely!
reviews.comment: It\'s good. Does its job! Would be nice if it had levels of brightness, but nevertheless the best flashlight app I\'ve ran across lol, which is a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quick light
reviews.comment: Nice app. Better than my previous one. Good setting options.
reviews.author: rajiv gogoi

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This is a great flashlight! It works perfectly, no problems at all! And I love the other light options it comes with (especially the strobe lights). I definitely recomend this! :)
reviews.author: Lea J

reviews.title: pretty good
reviews.comment: best app so far. but widgets could be a bit nicer, and if it could be turned on in notification bar, it would be perfect.
reviews.author: Vaidas Skanas

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: This app is so awesome love the different colours and the screen lights.the police lights are cool to.  :-)
reviews.author: Summer Kirke

reviews.title: amazing flashlight
reviews.comment: This app is great; it is easy to use and had many cool features. Saves my life when changing diapers at night!
reviews.author: Nathan Gardner
